title: Terraria 1.3.0.4 (Mac) (bundle)
description:
Terraria ported to Mac!

Version 1.3.0.4 is here!

This is just an initial release. Expect bugs. Tested in Yosemite, with working Multiplayer (Just joining, no hosting yet).

Try not to minimize the game, it may freeze (moving the window or multitasking is fine of course).
If you encounter any bugs, let me know.

Once opened, WAIT a bit. If opened many times, it WILL freeze. (Be patient)

To change resolution, select the optimum one and change to windowed and then back to fullscreen (or viceversa). It should adjust then.

1)Extract and open file.
2)The icon will start jumping, and a window will pop up (creating prefix)
3)Wait until the window closes and the icon dissapears (don't worry, it's supposed to happen) (Wait patiently)
4)Several seconds later (maybe even a minute), if any AirPlay device is found, it will ask for the password. Ignore this and cancel. (Not sure what happens in a network without AirPlay devices :) )
5)WAIT until Terraria opens (could take a while)

Once you enter a world, it will be slow for a few seconds, but it fixes right away

Enjoy!
